solution_line_template: First find the total amount of velvet James uses on the hats: {num_hats_needed} hats / {hats_per_yard} hats/yard = <<{num_hats_needed}/{hats_per_yard}={velvet_for_hats}>>{velvet_for_hats} yards

Then find the total amount of velvet he needs to make the cloaks: {num_cloaks_needed} cloaks * {yards_per_cloak} yards/cloak = <<{num_cloaks_needed}*{yards_per_cloak}={velvet_for_cloaks}>>{velvet_for_cloaks} yards

Then add those two amounts to find the total amount of velvet he needs: {velvet_for_hats} yards + {velvet_for_cloaks} yards = <<{velvet_for_hats}+{velvet_for_cloaks}={total_velvet_needed}>>{total_velvet_needed} yards
